contentList.content: Mental Interference
Pointing a finger at the target, you worm into the target's mind from afar. On hit, you may deal either 1d8 Psychic damage or 1d8 Force damage.
Pointing a finger at the target, you worm into the target's mind from afar. On hit, you deal [1]
Project Object
Your force of will moves any nearby object a short distance away.
Psychic Howl
In a moment, you change the winds direction around a specific area. All creatures within its radius must make an Intelligence saving throw or take [1] Damage. If they succeed, they only take half.
Spectral Shield
A thin layer of Magicka protects your body, improving your AC by +1.
You increase your AC by +1 until the beginning of your next turn. In addition, if you are the target of Magic Missiles, the attack automatically misses.
Appraising Touch
This creature has advantage on Intelligence checks relating to an item they hold.
For the duration of the spell, while holding an item, you have advantage on all Intelligence checks relating to it.
Brand
This creature has been branded, and cannot hide from the caster's eye.

You point at a creature within range. For the duration of the spell, the creature must succeed a Wisdom saving throw, or you will know exactly where the creature is, even if they become hidden or turn invisible.
Command
Command a creature to either Halt, Approach, Drop, Grovel, or Flee.
Nightshield
This Creature has resistance to Force Damage and is safe from Magic Missile. They also gain 1d4 to all Saving throws.

A protective field of shadowy energy cloaks your body, protecting you from Force damage and Magic Missile, while also granting a bonus to all saving throws. The spell ends if you are exposed to direct sunlight.
Pester
Pestered
This creature is being driven up the wall by a minor annoyance.

You cause a creature to be pestered by a seemingly innocuous, though annoying, distraction. A nagging itch it can't reach, a tickle in its throat, an eyelash falling into its eye. If it fails a saving throw, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom checks while under the effects.
Prophesized Strike
Vulnerable
This creature has been left vulnerable after a magical attack.

You cast your mind's eye a split second forward, finding the perfect opportunity to strike. You may make a melee attack using your Spellcasting modifier, dealing an additional [1], and leaving them vulnerable.
Smoke Ladder
You mold and shape ordinary smoke into a misty ladder, which glamors itself into a metallic-looking form.
Wieldskill
For the duration of the spell, you are proficient in a single skill you declare.
Wieldskill (Investigation)
You have proficiency in Investigation for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Perception)
You have proficiency in Perception for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Arcana)
You have proficiency in Arcana for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Insight)
You have proficiency in Insight for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Survival)
You have proficiency in Survival for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Religion)
You have proficiency in Religion for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Animal Handling)
You have proficiency in Animal Handling for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Stealth)
You have proficiency in Stealth for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Sleight of Hand)
You have proficiency in Sleight of Hand for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (History)
You have proficiency in History for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Performance)
You have proficiency in Performance for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Deception)
You have proficiency in Deception for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Intimidation)
You have proficiency in Intimidation for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Persuasion)
You have proficiency in Persuasion for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Medicine)
You have proficiency in Medicine for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Athletics)
You have proficiency in Athletics for 9 turns.
Wieldskill (Acrobatics)
You have proficiency in Acrobatics for 9 turns.
